document_data.name: Keryth Blackhelm
document_data.mainbody: '''High Marshal Keryth Blackhelm''' was a [[moon elf]] and high marshal of the island of [[Evermeet]]. He was also a member of the [[Council of Evermeet]]. He was responsible for the defense of the island kingdom.
document_data.Possessions: He wielded a fabulous enchanted [[spear]] called ''[[Khormalashalal]]''.
